meanings.definition: Novobiocins: a group of antibiotics used to treat bacterial infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed novobiocins to help fight the bacterial infection.
meanings.sent2: Pharmacies stock novobiocins to treat various bacterial infections.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria threw a party, but novobiocins crashed it and saved the day.
meanings.sent4: Novobiocins acted like knights, battling the bacterial invaders in the body.
meanings.sent5: The novobiocins were the superheroes that defeated the bacterial villains.
